tool_description: Sparkup is a powerful tool for revising the text to make it more engaging, easy to understand, and optimized for SEO.
name: Sparkup
title: Sparkup

api_list.name: SEO Optimization
api_list.description: Optimize your text for better SEO on your website.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://sparkup.p.rapidapi.com/api/seo"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "sparkup.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "sparkup.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Generate excerpt
api_list.description: This API will generate an excerpt of text from a given source. It will take the input source, analyze it, and generate a new excerpt that captures the essence of the original text.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://sparkup.p.rapidapi.com/api/excerpt"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "sparkup.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Text revision
api_list.description: Endpoint to revision your text. You can pass an intent, input, and its instructions.
